Entries.default: You come upon the site of an ancient battle. A ratty standard snaps in the breeze, its color leeched by the sun.
[Search the location.]
[Leave.]
...and find a bundle of unused scrolls bearing arcane runes and incantations.
...and find a small trinket in one of the bodies' packs.
...and find a few potions whose corks are still intact.
...and find a motley assortment of coins on the warriors' remains.
...and find some armor that's still in remarkably good condition.
...and find a weapon in better shape than you would've expected.
...and find nothing of value.
You've wandered the length of the battlefield. There's nothing left of any value.
[Keep searching this location.]
You take some time to explore the battlefield...
...and find a cache of undetonated explosives near a derelict supply cart.
...and find a strange pendant glowing with a soft, internal light.
[Take the pendant.]
You pick up the pendant and notice it's curiously warm to the touch, as if someone had just been wearing it.
You've wandered the length of the battlefield. There's nothing left of any value.
You find a field strewn with ancient corpses - it must be site of a battle that happened long ago. There might yet be something salvageable among the fallen.
The site of a recent battle spreads before you. The bodies of the routed force still lie where they fell, though most have been picked clean by scavenging beasts.
You return to searching the remains strewn across the battlefield.
You continue to poke about the area...
You take some time to explore the battlefield...
...and find a small trinket in one of the bodies' packs.
